Artifact_Selene.name: CONSTRUCTOR DRONE
Artifact_Selene.description: An invicible constructor drone follows you around, moving along with midrow.

Artifact_SeleneV2.name: ARMS RACE
Artifact_SeleneV2.description: Mount a cannon onto the constructor drone, shooting for 1 damage every time you attack. Beware of friendly fire!

AttachPart.name: ATTACH PART
AttachPart.description: Attach a part to your ship at the CONSTRUCTOR DRONE's location.

RecyclePart.name: RECYCLE PART
RecyclePart.description: Destroy a TEMP part at the CONSTRUCTOR DRONE's location.
RecyclePart.condition: the CONSTRUCTOR DRONE is aligned with a TEMP part

WeldPart.name: WELD PART
WeldPart.description: Modify a part at the CONSTRUCTOR DRONE's location.

Align.name: ALIGN
Align.description: Bring the CONSTRUCTOR DRONE to your cockpit.

MagPull.name: PULL MIDROW
MagPull.description: PULL all midrow objects toward your cockpit.

MagPush.name: PUSH MIDROW
MagPush.description: PUSH all midrow objects away from your cockpit.

Reinforce.name: REINFORCED
Reinforce.description: The next time a part should be destroyed because of Single Use, it isn't.

SingleUse.name: SINGLE USE
SingleUse.description: This part is destroyed after activating once.

Breakable.name: BREAKABLE
Breakable.description: This part is destroyed after being hit.

Temp.name: TEMPORARY
Temp.description: This part is removed after combat.

Scaffolding.name: WEAK SCAFFOLDING
Scaffolding.description: This part is destroyed when you move.

Shield.name: SHIELD
Shield.description: This and adjacent parts take 1 less damage from attacks.

ShieldV2.name: SHIELD V2
ShieldV2.description: This and adjacent parts take 2 less damage from attacks.

Cloak.name: CLOAKING
Cloak.description: On turn start, create 1 <c=card>Activate Cloaking</c> in hand if you don't already have one.

ThrusterRight.name: THRUSTER
ThrusterRight.description: On turn end, pushes the ship 1 spaces to the left.

ThrusterV2Right.name: THRUSTER V2
ThrusterV2Right.description: On turn end, pushes the ship 2 spaces to the left.

ThrusterLeft.name: THRUSTER
ThrusterLeft.description: On turn end, pushes the ship 1 space to the right.

ThrusterV2Left.name: THRUSTER V2
ThrusterV2Left.description: On turn end, pushes the ship 2 spaces to the right.

Bubble.name: BUBBLE BAY
Bubble.description: Whenever a midrow object passes in front of this, it gets bubbled.

ActivateCloak.name: Activate Cloaking
ActivateCloak.description: Cloaking Device and adjacent parts become EMPTY until next turn.
ActivateCloak.descriptionB: Your entire ship becomes EMPTY until next turn.

Magnetize.name: Magnetize
Magnetize.push: PUSH all midrow objects away from your cockpit.
Magnetize.pull: PULL all midrow objects toward your cockpit.

EjectAll.name: Disassembly
EjectAll.description: Eject all your temporary parts, dealing 2 damage per hit.
EjectAll.descriptionB: Eject all your temporary parts, dealing 3 damage per hit.

Weld.name: Weld
Weld.description: Remove Single Use from a part.
Weld.descriptionA: Remove Temporary and Single Use from a part.
Weld.descriptionB: Remove Temporary, Single Use, and Breakable from a part.
